issue.title: [C++][Compute] Improve mode kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10090](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10090). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
1. Replace naive array data visitor with optimized VisitArrayDataInline. It improves performance significantly.
2. Add chunked array test cases.

comments.body:
